import Header from "./Header"; import Main from "./Main"; import Footer from "./Footer"; import {PopupWithForm} from "./PopupWithForm"; import {ImagePopup} from "./ImagePopup"; import React from 'react'; function App() { const [isEditProfilePopupOpen, setEditProfilePopupOpen] = React.useState(false); // true или false const [isAddPlacePopupOpen, setAddPlacePopupOpen] = React.useState(false); // true или false const [isEditAvatarPopupOpen, setAvatarPopupOpen] = React.useState(false); // true или false function handelEditAvatar() { setAvatarPopupOpen(true) } function onEditAvatar() { setEditProfilePopupOpen(true); } function handleAddPlaceClick() { setAddPlacePopupOpen(true) } return (
/> /> /> Да/>
); } export default App;
